instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a high-end, enterprise-grade blogging platform. Do not use default Shadcn styles. Override them with the 'Cobra Enterprise' styles defined here. Everything must be Black, White, or Grey. No colors unless absolutely necessary for error states.
instructions_to_main_agent.layout_rules: Use the Bento Grid for the home page. Mix text-only cards with image cards. Use large typography. Don't be afraid of empty black space.
instructions_to_main_agent.content_rules: All text must be in Plain English. Attribution is key - add a 'Sources' section to every blog post footer.
instructions_to_main_agent.tech_stack: React (JS), Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion (for smooth reveals), Lucide React.
instructions_to_main_agent.file_structure_note: If .tsx files are not available, use .js and .jsx. Ensure Tailwind config includes the custom colors and fonts.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
